channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Humba Ventures raises $40M fund to invest in deep tech, defense tech
item.description: Humba Ventures is a sister-firm to Susa Ventures, the seed-stage firm that has backed companies like Robinhood, Human Interest and Flexport. © 2024 Te...

item.title: Zomato faces $95 million India tax bill

item.title: 17 Best Gifts for Babies and Toddlers, Editor Tested and Reviewed
